ygData.subject: Re: Hunting spots & Race issues
ygData.msgSnippet: u can follow the wall if u want, but watch out for 3 things...  the first being that u have to cross the river.  at lvl 22, u shouldn t have a problem with
ygData.messageBody:
u can follow the wall if u want, but watch out for 3 things... the first
being that u have to cross the river. at lvl 22, u shouldn't have a problem
with this (the piranahs should all con green). the second is along the wall
close to najena u will run into the neriak entrance. here, there are 2
dragoons that are in the lvl 40ish range, so u better skirt around them.
most of the other guards in neriak will con green to u at lvl 22, with the
occassional dragoon at the bridge (at 26, i con all the guards green on the
bridge most of the time). the third problem is the guard that sits in front
of the najena zone. i con him green most of the time, but occassionaly, a
dragoon will sit in his place. if he sits in his normal spot, u'll have to
go invis to avoid him.

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

ps. at lvl 24 u get ur nek gate. this will gate u fairly close to the
najena entrance.

-----Original Message-----

Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Hunting spots & Race issues

you
>follow any walls to get to the Najena zone?
>
>As to all the comments regarding races:
>
><roleplay>Bah! Gnomes are the most irreputable and unfriendly little
>creatures I've ever met. Little vile knee-biting creatures with an ego
>second only in size to their huge heads. :P </roleplay>
>
>Lim'Dul hasn't had too many good experiences with Gnomes. ;)
>
>--Lim'Dul
>22 HE Wiz Veeshan
